page.title: 06ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: {Horse racing} was at one time very popular in Lanark,however this is now a thing of the past and has been replaced by Trotting. The Trotting meetings take place throughout the summer ,but are not as popular as the{ {Horse Racing}. The Riding of Horses for pleasure is very popular and there is a very active Riding club.Another popular sport is {Bowling} and Lanark is in the position of having two {Bowling }clubs due to the popularity of the sport.Less well known in Lanark is the sport of {Archery},which has a good following.{Popular Entertainment} takes several forms in Lanark.To begin with there is the Bingo at the old Regal Cinema and there is snooker and Disco dancing at Foxey's.The relative absence of entertainment for young people has had the tendancy to cause problems.
